name: .JWLIBRARY
summary: Learn about .JWLIBRARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can import a JWLIBRARY file into JW Library (Windows, Android, iOS) to restore the annotations it contains. To do so:
Open JW Library and select the Cloud icon.
Navigate to and import your JWLIBRARY file.

Advanced users can use JWLMerge (Windows) to merge the annotations two or more JWLIBRARY files contain into a single JWLIBRARY file, which can then be used to restore the merged annotations in JW Library. However, JWLMerge is discontinued.
